XRTransientInputHitTestResult.summary: NOTE Experimental The XRTransientInputHitTestResult interface of the WebXR Device API contains an array of results of a hit test for transient input, grouped by input source.

remarks.para: You can get an array of XRHitTestResult objects for a frame by calling .

XRTransientInputHitTestResultResults.summary: NOTE Experimental The read-only results property of the interface represents an array of objects containing the hit test results for the input source, ordered by the distance along the ray used to perform the hit test, with the closest result at position 0.

XRTransientInputHitTestResultInputSource.summary: NOTE Experimental The read-only inputSource property of the interface represents an object that was used to compute the array.
